00030 using namespace Hypertable;

00033 namespace {

00035   const char *usage[] = {
00036     "usage: merge_diff [options] <file-a> <file-b>",
00037     "",
00038     "  options:",
00039     "    --verify  Verify that each file is sorted along the way and report",
00040     "              an error if they are not.",
00041     "",
00042     "  This program performs a diff of two sorted files.  The files must be",
00043     "  sorted as if they had been created with the following commands:",
00044     "",
00045     "  $ LC_ALL=C sort <input-a> > <file-a>",
00046     "  $ LC_ALL=C sort <input-b> > <file-b>",
00047     "",
00048     "  The output is indeterminate if the files are not properly sorted.  To",
00049     "  verify that the files are properly sorted and the output is valid,",
00050     "  supply the --verify option",
00051     "",
00052     (const char *)0
00053   };
00054 
00055 }

00058 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00059   const char *file_a=0, *file_b=0;
00060   bool verify=false;
00061   std::ifstream in_a;
00062   std::ifstream in_b;
00063   string line_a, line_b;
00064   int state = 0;
00065   int cmpval;
00066   bool a_cached = false;
00067   bool b_cached = false;
00068 
00069   System::initialize(argv[0]);
00070 
00071   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00072     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verify"))
00073       verify = true;
00074     else if (argv[i][0] == '-')
00075       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00076     else if (file_a == 0)
00077       file_a = argv[i];
00078     else if (file_b == 0)
00079       file_b = argv[i];
00080     else
00081       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00082   }
00083 
00084   if (file_b == 0)
00085     Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00086 
00087   in_a.open(file_a, ifstream::in);
00088   in_b.open(file_b, ifstream::in);
00089 
00090   while (in_a.good()) {
00091 
00092     if (!in_b.good()) {
00093       if (state == 2)
00094         cout << "---" << endl;
00095       if (a_cached) {
00096         cout << "< " << line_a << endl;
00097         a_cached = false;
00098       }
00099       while (in_a.good()) {
00100         if (getline(in_a, line_a))
00101           cout << "< " << line_a << endl;
00102       }
00103       break;
00104     }
00105 
00106     if (!a_cached && !getline(in_a, line_a))
00107       continue;
00108 
00109     if (!b_cached && !getline(in_b, line_b)) {
00110       a_cached = true;
00111       continue;
00112     }
00113 
00114     if ((cmpval = strcmp(line_a.c_str(), line_b.c_str())) < 0) {
00115       a_cached = false;
00116       b_cached = true;
00117       if (state == 2)
00118         cout << "---" << endl;
00119       state = 1;
00120       cout << "< " << line_a << endl;
00121     }
00122     else if (cmpval > 0) {
00123       a_cached = true;
00124       b_cached = false;
00125       if (state == 1)
00126         cout << "---" << endl;
00127       state = 2;
00128       cout << "> " << line_b << endl;
00129     }
00130     else
00131       a_cached = b_cached = false;
00132 
00133   }
00134 
00135   if (in_b.good()) {
00136     if (state == 1)
00137       cout << "---" << endl;
00138     if (b_cached) {
00139       cout << "> " << line_b << endl;
00140       b_cached = false;
00141     }
00142     while (in_b.good()) {
00143       if (getline(in_b, line_b))
00144         cout << "> " << line_b << endl;
00145     }
00146   }
00147 
00148   in_a.close();
00149   in_b.close();
00150 
00151 
00152 }
